title: The Chase (remastered edition) (1946, noir, imdb score: 6.6)

sources.title: The Chase (remastered edition) (1946, noir, imdb score: 6.6)
sources.description: The Chase is a 1946 American film noir directed by Arthur Ripley. The screenplay by Philip Yordan is based on Cornell Woolrich's 1944 novel The Black Path of Fear . It stars Robert Cummings as a veteran, Chuck Scott, who suffers from hallucinations. When he returns a lost wallet to violent mobster Eddie Roman (Steve Cochran), Eddie offers to hire him as a chauffeur. Chuck gets mixed up in a plot to help Eddie's wife, Lorna (Mich√®le Morgan), run off to Havana to escape her cruel husband.
